verbose_text: After whole-mount AP staining, ZAP-IC-Notch1 / Tie2-Cre embryos exhibited purple / blue color on the blood vessels in the embryos and yolk sacs (XREF_FIG), indicating that Cre excision of the STOP signal successfully activated constitutive Notch1 signaling together with hPLAP expression.
evidence: STOP signal successfully activated constitutive Notch1
